archimate:DataObject.name: FinancialAccount
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A FinancialAccount is part of the sub-ledger accounting that aggregates the amounts of one or more party accounts owned by a given party. Itâ€™s an internal view of the CSP to manage incomes and outcomes. It is only an internal accounting which does not need to follow the GeneralLedger accounting regulation. Each accounting event from a PartyAccount is logged to a FinancialAccount according to the assignment rules specified by PartyAccountAssignment.
